title: Looking to build a serious silver team from the ground up. (MID TAKEN)
body:
*UPDATE* ROSTER FULL, OUR PLAYERS MAY LEAVE ANYTIME THOUGH, BE SURE TO LEAVE DETAILS IN CASE SOMEONE LEAVES AND I'LL PICK YOU UP, MAKES THINGS EASIER.
SUBS ALSO WANTED, JUST IN YOUR APPLICATION TO MAKE SURE YOU ARE WILLING TO BE A SUB
Hi, I am currently looking to build a serious team to play in the ranked teams ladder soon or as quick as possible. If you want to understand where I'm coming from on such a serious matter Is that I too was part of a ranked team with people that would  never play ranked teams and very inconsistent games.
So here I am, looking for a bunch of new versatile laners to make one hell of a team.
The Roles That will needed to make this happen are.
TOP - milkybarkid1
Jungle - Lexhanatin
Mid - Junior
ADC - H4X
Support - KawaiiiPanda

I currently play Mid Primarily, My favorite champions in the current meta are {{champion:238}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:61}} 
I can however play the following champions to an understandable level {{champion:268}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:127}} 

I am currently 15 years of age and are looking for people from various ages (I'm not picky), consistent people that take this game to somewhat of a serious level. I hope you know the basics of csing and switching to sweepers, etc. Silver may seem like a low standard, but with enough teamwork, we can reach much further. Team name has not been decided yet. 

If interested, be sure to just provide your IGN, Age, champion pool, role, and means of communication, I prefer someone with skype but we can always make do. Please note, this post will be open to anyone who gets the basis of this game to a above average level. I will hope to be primarily the shotcaller of the team and help us win our games. 

Thanks for your time.

replies.body: Did you not accept my friend invite?

Gold elo, can top / adc or jungle

ign : draeneroth

top - irelia, nasus, mao
adc - ezreal, cait, corki
jungle - vi, xin, lee

Hi, I'm happy to be a sub for this team, since I can generally play all the lanes except jungle.  I prefer solo laning, but I can bottom lane too.
My top 3 champions in order of skill

Top: {{champion:37}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:133}} 
Mid: {{champion:37}} {{champion:4}}  {{champion:8}} 
Bot: {{champion:37}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:110}} 
Support: {{champion:34}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:267}} (NOT {{champion:37}} )

These are just my top 3 champions in each role, but I'm open and have plenty of others as needed.  I just usually prefer playing Sona in lane.
I do have a weird tendency to just pick Sona even when up against the likes of Yasuo/Zed in mid or Jax/Aatrox in top, but I can handle it.
Rank: Silver 3 (I got this from using pretty much ONLY {{champion:37}} in mid and top in solo/duo queue)
Communications: skype and teamspeak.

And no, this is NOT a joke.  I'm fully serious to prove Sona can be a solo laner, and I've reached Silver 3 as solo mid and solo top Sona.

ign:kawaiii panda
add me in game please, did not receive the invite
with triple i, you only have two on the top.

IGN:Dabigman69
AGE:16
Rank:silver 4
Main role:JG/Top whatever suits
Secondary role:mid
Question, do you have to be silver??

IGN: Lexhanatin
Age: 18
Champion Pool: Amumu, Elise, Jarvan, Jax, Lee Sin, Pantheon, Udyr, Volibear, Warwick, Wukong, Xin Zhao
Role: Jungle
Communication: Skype, Teamspeak/Ventrillo (if server is provided).

I'm dedicated and mature with high availability this semester.

Hey mate, myself and a friend are looking for a team for good times. I play only ADC am very good ADC, I play Lucian, Caitlyn and Can learn more. My friend is very good can play any role required. We will only play if voice coms are used. We are both are a mature 20. 

Ign: H4x
Thanks.
keen for jg sup adc, will sub mid.
